Hi,

I try to solve a problem dealing with condensed-phase ideal solutions. 
For this I've found in the "definingphases.pdf" the hint to a method 
"ideal_solution()", but this seems not to be implemented, yet. Is there 
any workaround available in Cantera 1.6.0?

Best regards,
Bernd
